name: barsoft
title: barSoft
description: Quickly open modules and routes within the BarSoft application.
author: gergo_szabo

commands.name: barsoft
commands.title: barSoft
commands.subtitle: Generated by BarSoft Devs
commands.description: Access various barSoft modules and routes directly.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
